Question.Subject: internet not loading pages and very slow?
Question.Content: i ave fire fox i installed the newest update and pages some pages wont load like a game i play is called empire craft and the website wont load and wen it does i go to play te game and te game wont load i dont know if its my internet or there server or my internet pervidors problum can some one please help
Question.ChosenAnswer: Try a different browser...like Opera, or IE. If it is still slow, I would suggest turning off and on your router.

Answer.Content: Try a different browser...like Opera, or IE. If it is still slow, I would suggest turning off and on your router.
Have you defragged your hard drive recently? You may also need to update Flash.

There are MANY reasons for computer slow downs: not enough memory too many programs starting up with windows at boot up time too many junk files too many restore points
Clean windows registry can speed up the computer. Over time, you install new programs, uninstalled unimportant programs, update software's, install new devices, download files from the web, etcetera, hence embarking all records in the registry system. This is normal, but it is not wise to leave it untouched. Once in a while, you have to check and remove files that are no longer in use to maintain the speed of your PC. Clean registry make pc faster. http://downloadlk.com
